member.value: Inidicates whether this was a 3D Secure payment downgraded to non-3D Secure (when `attempt_n3d` is specified)

member.name: P:CheckoutPaymentGateway.Common.ThreeDSEnrollment.Enrolled
member.summary: Indicates the 3D Secure enrollment status of the issuer * `Y` - Issuer enrolled * `N` - Customer not enrolled * `U` - Unknown
member.value: Indicates the 3D Secure enrollment status of the issuer * `Y` - Issuer enrolled * `N` - Customer not enrolled * `U` - Unknown

member.summary: Verification to ensure the integrity of the response
member.value: Verification to ensure the integrity of the response

member.name: P:CheckoutPaymentGateway.Common.ThreeDSEnrollment.AuthenticationResponse
member.summary: Indicates whether or not the cardholder was authenticated * `Y` - Customer authenticated * `N` - Customer not authenticated * `A` - An authentication attempt occurred but could not be completed * `U` - Unable to perform authentication
member.value: Indicates whether or not the cardholder was authenticated * `Y` - Customer authenticated * `N` - Customer not authenticated * `A` - An authentication attempt occurred but could not be completed * `U` - Unable to perform authentication

member.summary: Base64 encoded cryptographic identifier (CAVV) used by the card schemes to validate the integrity of the 3D secure payment data
member.value: Base64 encoded cryptographic identifier (CAVV) used by the card schemes to validate the integrity of the 3D secure payment data
